pullRequest.title: Decouple the handling of the monitoring entitlement and formulas
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?
This patch is an attempt to decouple the handling of monitoring entitlements and their corresponding Formula assignments. The idea is that the FormulaManager class could hold an instance of SystemEntitlementManager to assign monitoring entitlements according to Formula enablement. To support the other direction as well a separate MonitoringManager could handle the enablement / disablement of monitoring according to entitlement assignment / removal based on FormulaFactory.
This is a diagram of involved classes and their relations in the desired outcome:

GUI diff
No difference.

nodes.bodyText: this line seems to be removed but not added anywhere else again. Was this on purpose?
i think the logging is fine here until we maybe tackle more consistent error handling overall.

i think to be consistent with the previous code this would need to return the ValidatorError and the places using it would need to merge the this ValidatorError with the one returned by addEntitlementToServer.

beforeCommit.message: Pass MonitoringManager to the constructor of SystemEntitler

commit.message: Use interface and remove local exception handling

Remove now obsolete methods from FormulaManager

- enableMonitoringOnEntitlementAdd(MinionServer minion)
- disableMonitoringOnEntitlementRemoval(MinionServer minion)
- isMonitoringCleanupNeeded(MinionServer server)
Pass MonitoringManager to the constructor of SystemEntitler
